title: ACI Triangle Shadow Activation for UMA Signal Proposal Mode

strategic_context.strategic_question: Can FjordHQ see opportunity before the market - without acting on it?

authorization_summary.purpose: Transform verified learning into economically meaningful signal proposals

authorized_actions: Generate alpha hypotheses in PROPOSED_SHADOW state
Consume outputs from SitC, InForage, IKEA
Write proposals to canonical pipeline with Q1-Q5 traceability
hard_stops: Execute, allocate, simulate capital or trigger automation
Retrain models or alter forecast logic
Feed proposals back into forecasting or learning loops

authorized_actions: Synthesize regime state, forecast error patterns, hindsight findings
Produce explicit reasoning chains for each proposed signal
Retrieve time-sensitive or market-specific data when requested by SitC
Retrieve data when mandated by IKEA
Evaluate search ROI and log all retrieval actions
Provide retrieved data as inputs only
Classify all factual claims used in UMA proposals
Block any proposal containing unverified external claims
Log all classifications and blocks to fhq_meta.knowledge_boundary_log

forbidden_actions: Feedback from proposals into forecasting models
Any ADR or EC state changes

requirements: Consistently propose non-trivial, internally coherent alpha hypotheses
Demonstrate clear linkage from past learning to forward-looking signals
Surface signals that warrant human or shadow backtest review

phase_1.name: Execution Gates Setup
tasks: Create hard stop constraints in database
Update agent mandates with shadow authorization

phase_2.name: UMA Proposal Pipeline
tasks: Create proposal validation trigger with IKEA gate
